function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Opportunity to violate measures leading to noncompliance","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Enforce stricter measures and limit opportunities for nonessential activities","Technologies":"Location tracking, surveillance technology","People":"Individuals with more opportunities to violate measures","Owner":"Policymakers, government authorities"},{"Description":"Impulsivity associated with noncompliance","Impact":"Higher likelihood of noncompliance with COVID-19 measures","Mitigation":"Provide targeted interventions for individuals with higher impulsivity","Technologies":"Behavioral interventions, mental health support","People":"Impulsive individuals","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Positive association between social norms and compliance","Impact":"Influences on individuals' compliance with measures","Mitigation":"Promote positive social norms and role modeling for compliance","Technologies":"Social media campaigns, community engagement platforms","People":"General population influenced by social norms","Owner":"Community leaders, influencers"}]}
